product_title: Dew Drops Vegan Espadrille Wedge Sandal
product_description: A sky-high platform wedge wrapped in braided jute and twisted accents at the band add textural appeal to a sandal secured with a quarter strap.
product_details_and_care:
A sky-high platform wedge wrapped in braided jute and twisted accents at the band add textural appeal to a sandal secured with a quarter strap.
4" heel; 1 1/2" platform (size 8.5)
Adjustable strap with buckle closure
PETA-certified vegan leather
Textile upper/synthetic lining/rubber sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
